mapper.update: update place set type_id = #{type_id}, title = #{title}, add1 = #{add1}, add2 = #{add2}, areaCode = #{areaCode}, cat1 = #{cat1}, cat2 = #{cat2}, cat3 = #{cat3}, firstImage1 = #{firstImage1}, firstImage2 = #{firstImage2}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, mlevel = #{mlevel}, area_code = #{area_code}, sigunguCode = #{sigunguCode}, tel = #{tel}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, modified_time = #{modified_time}, where place_id = #{place_id}
